duas.title: After Eating
duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنِي هَذَا وَرَزَقَنِيهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّي وَلَا قُوَّةٍ
duas.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahil-ladhi at'amani hadha wa razaqanihi min ghairi haulin minni wa la quwwah
duas.translation: Praise be to Allah who has given me this food and provided it for me without any effort or power on my part
